Text.Language: Ouw~ou nem outaio: outaio nem ouw~ou: n~]pana~gia~ Triac Viwt nem Ps/ri nem Pip~neuma eyouab. }nou nem n~c/ou niben nem sa e~neh n~te nie~neh t/rou: a~m/n.
Glory and honor, honor and glory to the All-Holy Trinity, the Father and the Son and the Holy Spirit, now and at all times and unto the age of all ages. Amen.
